docs.text: Welcome to intelyConnect To log in to the application visit app.intelyconnect.org . Overview of intelyConnect intelyConnect offers a no-code and low-code approach to integrating with a system of record. We have created standard connections and templated workflows to facilitate seamless and repeatable integration for the non-technical user and technical user. Sign up Log In Dashboard Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. workflows.md # The workflow documentation about.md # The about page ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
